Translations.Text: Nekoen, akka, i sen Nefka. Zhut, deqqal a ppeeoem
La qesden, i wur ssinen, amur seg wayen is iten Neozeq. S Oebbi, ar fellawen asteqsi, $ef wayen id tesnulfuyem
Gern aS d, i Oebbi, tullas. Gedha s yiS! I nitni, ayen ssarmen
Ma becceon yiwen s teqcict, ad yibrik wudem is, ad iqbeo
Ad iveooef iman is, si medden, ilmend n yir usali it id ibbwven. A p ijmaa, tamara, ne$ a p irr seddaw wakal? Ay dir wamek debbioen
I wid ur numin ara s laxert: amedya ucmit. I Oebbi: amedya aalayen mavi. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Oebbi, lemmer Ipqissi medden, $ef ddens nnsen, ur d Ippaoa, degs, amexluq. Maca, Iswexxio iten ar lajel ipwassnen. Ma iusa d lajel nnsen, ur t swexxioen, ur t id seqoaben, s ssaaa
Garen aS d, i Oebbi, ayen keohen. Skaddben yilsawen nnsen, mi qqaoen ar ayen ilhan, nnsen. Ay nnsen, war ccekk, d times. Ih, nitni ad zwiren
S Oebbi, ni$ Nuzen ed, i leoyus, uqbel ik. Cciian icebbee asen igiten nnsen. Assa, d bab nnsen. I nitni, aaaqeb aqeoean
Nessader ak edTazmamt, iwakken kan ad asen tbeggnev ayen i$ef mgarraden, akw i nnhaya akked ueunu i ugdud iumnen
